name: No Overlap
description:
Can you combine the discs without letting their circles overlap? How many can you do before you run out of time? In this score-attack game, see how well you can visualize overlapping discs. Click two discs in order to combine them.

You can delete highscore data by pressing Q while P and M are pressed.

All assets are made for this game by Divagated (except for the font, which was made by Divagated, but not for this game)

Made for ScoreSpace Jam #12

https://itch.io/jam/scorejam12

https://gamejam.com/game/no-overlap
